entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Terra Nova (National Park)

entry.title: Current Conditions: 13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 13.1°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
